City Council
============

1000 N Old Betsy Road Cleburne TX 76031

[Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/1000+N+Old+Betsy+Road+Cleburne+TX+76031)  
  
 Physical Address:View Map

1000 N Old Betsy Road  
Cleburne, TX 76031

Phone:

[817-641-3336 Ext. 105](tel:8176413336;105)

[Email](mailto:citysecretary@keenetx.com)  
Link: [City Council Page](http://www.keenetx.com/183/City-Council)
